title: DAZ3D - iRadiance Pro Series 16k HDRIs - Photo Studio for Iray
description:
iRadiance Pro Series 16k HDRIs are a new wave of extremely high resolution HDRIs. Each map comes as a 16k (16384x8192) EXR for crystal clear backgrounds along side high definition accurate lighting. They also come with 8k (8192x4096) and 4k (4096x2048) versions for those with fewer system resources, or times where HD backgrounds aren't needed.

This Photo Studio set comes with 5 different HDRI setups perfect for character rendering and promo creation. Three different versions of the panoramic photo cove featuring different real world lighting rigs give you a traditional background for your character's photo shoot. Two different vignette locations provide an interesting environments to work with, be it in front of the fireplace or around the bedroom and lounge.

BONUS: Also included in this set are four HDRI based mesh light presets capturing the lighting information from real world photographic light sources. Perfect for everyday render or augmenting your Photo Studio HDRIs.
 
http://www.daz3d.com/iradiance-pro-series-16k-hdris-photo-studio-for-iray
